events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position. The resume demonstrates strong experience with backend development and cloud technologies.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on keywords like 'software', 'engineer', and 'cloud computing' found in the candidate's resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process to ensure focused communication and timely updates.
The initial phone screening went well; candidate showed solid understanding of software development lifecycle and experience with DevOps practices.
The candidate responded promptly to our interview scheduling request and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
We have scheduled the candidateâ€™s technical interview with the engineering team for April 15th, ensuring availability of senior developers for the session.
